dmca.title: Individual complains to Google that email was posted to BadBusinessBureau
dmca.body:
Dear Google,


1.
Hi the copyrighted work at issue is the text (including a copyrighted email message property of our company) that appears on http://www.badbusinessbureau.com/reports/ripoff173174.htm. As they state in their page the email message was produced by one of our workers so you know the material is ours.

2.

Search Query: getacoder
Infringing Web Page: http://www.badbusinessbureau.com/reports/ripoffl73174.htm http:/lwww.ripoffreport.com/reports/ripoff173174.htm


3.
GetACoder.com Contact info: [private]@getacoder.com


4.
badbusinessbureau.com and ripoffreport.com Contact Info: [private]@RipOffReport.com or [private]@ripoffreport.com

5.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law

6.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

I am signing this and faxing it to the fax number given, now. Respectfully,
